item.title: Social Links
item.description: Social Media Links Email -> your(at)email@provider.com Mastodon -> This is where the cool infosec people hang out. :) Twitter -> I check my DM’s fairly often. Linkedin -> I check my DM’s everyone once and a while. Youtube -> Sometimes I post things that I’m working on. Blog -> Research and long form content. Roundup -> Weekly “What have I been working on” geared toward helping people see what they can do to get experience without paying for certs/degrees.
